item.name: Create User with Password & Recovery Question
Create Activated User with Password & Recovery Question
Create Activated User with Recovery Question
Create User with Non-Default User Type

request.description:
First use the User Types API to create a new User Type.  Then fill in {{typeId}} in your environment with the 20-character ID of the new type.

Once you create a User of that type, you will not be able to delete the User Type without first deleting the User.
